title: ATS Score for BTech CSE Fresher 2026: The Ultimate Guide
metaDescription: Discover the ideal ATS score for BTech CSE freshers in 2026. Learn how to optimize your resume for TCS, Google, and Amazon campus placements.
content:
## Introduction
In the competitive landscape of 2026, an ATS score is the most critical metric for any BTech CSE student. Most companies receive thousands of applications, and a human only sees about 20% of them. If your score is below 85, you are likely in the rejection pile.

## Why ATS Matters for CSE
Computer Science engineering is high in demand but also high in volume. Algorithms look for specific technical strings like 'distributed systems', 'microservices', and 'latency optimization'.

## How to Improve Your Score
1. Use a single column layout.
2. Include technical skills at the top.
3. Mention project impact with numbers.

## FAQ
**What is a good score?**
Anything above 85 is excellent.

**Does layout matter?**
Yes, tables and columns often break scanners.

schema.headline: ATS Score for BTech CSE Fresher 2026

title: Resume Format for TCS Campus Placement 2026
metaDescription: Download the best resume format for TCS campus placements 2026. Optimized for the TCS iON ATS algorithm and HR requirements.
content:
## TCS Recruitment Standards 2026
TCS uses the iON platform for initial screening. Their algorithm is designed to prioritize students from recognized institutes with a strong CGPA and verified skills.

## Best Format
The best format for TCS is the reverse-chronological template. It clearly shows your progress from first year to final year.

## Must-Have Skills for TCS
- Java / Python / C++
- Database Management
- Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
- Agile Methodologies

## FAQ
**Can I use colors?**
It's better to keep it black and white for higher parse accuracy.

schema.headline: Resume Format for TCS Campus Placement 2026
